newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - May 23.
newsitem.headline: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - May 23.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors likely to affect Malaysian stocks on Friday:
* U.S. Dow Jones industrial average closed 32.56 points lower at 7,258.13 on Thursday.
* Listing of YTL Power International Bhd, with 235 million shares being offered at 3.40 ringgit each for retail investors and 4.00 each for institutions.
* Malaysian blue chips ended higher on Thursday with the benchmark Composite Index closing 12.41 points or 1.17 percent higher to 1,071.03.
* MBf Capital declined on Thursday to confirm rumours of a possible merger with Suria Capital.
* Dealers said the market would most likely continue to be dominated by retail players, with institutional investors remaining sidelined.
